lead_paragraph: A truck bomb that killed at least 30 people and wounded more than 300 underscored fears about the group’s ability to infiltrate the Afghan capital.

byline.original: By MUJIB MASHAL and AHMAD SHAKIB

headline.print_headline: Taliban Begin Fighting Season With an Attack in Kabul
headline.main: Taliban Send Message With Deadly Kabul Attack as Fighting Season Begins

snippet: A truck bomb that killed at least 30 people and wounded more than 300 underscored fears about the group’s ability to infiltrate the Afghan capital.
abstract: Taliban mark start of spring fighting season with huge truck bomb in heart of Kabul, sending message that they can attack Afghanistan's capital at will and are not interested in peace talks; bombing kills at least 30 people and wounds over 300.
